          <title>
            <string language="sl">Strelovod</string>
            <string language="en">Lightening rod</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beleuchtungstange</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tige d'allégement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Haste do lightening</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Asta di alleggerimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Lightening ράβδος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Barra del aligeramiento</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Delovanje strelovoda na principu porazdelitve naboja bližje nasprotno nabitemu oblaku.</string>
            <string language="en">Principle behind lightning rod - distribution of charged particles in earth and cloud.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">strelovod</string>
            <string language="en">lightning rod</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="sl">strela</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundregel hinter Blitzstange - Verteilung der 
belasteten Partikel in der Masse und in der Wolke.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Principe derrière la tige de foudre - 
distribution des particules chargées en terre et nuage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Princípio atrás da haste do relâmpago - 
distribuição de partículas carregadas na terra e na nuvem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Principio dietro l'asta del lampo - distribuzione
delle particelle caricate in terra e nube.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχή πίσω από τη ράβδο αστραπής - διανομή των 
χρεωμένων μορίων στη γη και το σύννεφο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Principio detrás de la barra del relámpago - 
distribución de partículas cargadas en tierra y nube.</string>
          </description>
